resources.string: QWERTY Quest is a typing adventure game where you defeat enemies with the power of your mobile keyboard!
Here is a possible enemy encounter with important details labelled from 1 to 4 and described below

1. These are text bubbles. Accurately type what you see. Different bubble colours have different effects like attacking and healing! 

 2. Each text bubble has an associated timer. Type the text before the timer runs out! 

 3. This is the enemy! Their health bar is above it. Win by getting their health to 0. 

 4. This is the text area. What you type will be shown here. Your health bar is right above it. You lose if this bar reaches 0.
